title: Using the chat normaly + report result of a ban.
body:
Stop dodging this , everywhere i post this on the internet people doesn't understand how i can be the one in fault when the toxic person is clearly visible.

**KEY 1** : I DO NOT COMMENT THE ADC ATTITUDE, I USE THE CHAT NORMAL TO ANSWER. STOP BEING FOCUSED ON THE CHAT LIKE IM SOLO TO SPEAK, WHEN THERE ARE THE CHAT OF THE ADC TOO (AGAIN SOMETHING TO MAKE FEEL IT'S CHAT FLAME)

**KEY 2** : THE FACT OF 1M5 POINTS MASTERIES IS ABOUT WHY SUCH A LONG EXPERIENCED PLAYER CAN BE SO HATEFUL AGAINST SOMEONE IN GAME FOR HIS OWN MISTAKES

**KEY 3** : THERE IS ANY HARRASSMENT, FLAMING, BAD USE OF THE CHAT, TOXICITY , FLAME TO FLAME, IM THE ONE WHO GOT ALL OF THIS DURING THE WHOLE GAME, AND MY BEHAVIOR WASNT DISTURBED BY THIS.

SO CLEARLY USING THE CHAT WITH MORE THAN 10 SENTENCES + HAVING A REPORT IS SYNONYME OF A BAN.

Match 2
En jeu
Kuroki Kaze: you suicide
Kuroki Kaze: under tower
Kuroki Kaze: mf
Kuroki Kaze: not my fault
Kuroki Kaze: + mf
Kuroki Kaze: you got caught by morganaz
Kuroki Kaze: too many times..

**Adc push the tower and got hit whitout realising it. He get killed by long range attack from kaisa coming back from base 
=> result : insult, noob support, etc, etc.**

Kuroki Kaze: gj team

**Encouragement.**

Kuroki Kaze: what are u doing mf ...
Kuroki Kaze: how can u be such a flamer
Kuroki Kaze: i dont focus morg u kidding me?
Kuroki Kaze: all my spell
Kuroki Kaze: are on her
Kuroki Kaze: i dont understand why a 1million missfortune player
Kuroki Kaze: play like this

**Adc push again tower enemy. Got stun by morgana. We started a 2v2 fight. Got killed 
=> result : insult, noob support, you don't focus morgana fucking noob, etc, etc.**

Kuroki Kaze: vlad
Kuroki Kaze: on blue

**Information for the team.**

Kuroki Kaze: didnt know twitch there lol
Kuroki Kaze: why do u
Kuroki Kaze: flame
Kuroki Kaze: like this?
Kuroki Kaze: they not did drake too
Kuroki Kaze: in 20min
Kuroki Kaze: zed 9/3 run away from trynd
Kuroki Kaze: on 2V1

**I got killed twitch (invisible o_o). The mid laner zed (who was on 9/3) start flaming freely => result : insult, fucking noob, nice brain r%%%%%, got killed by twi%%%%%oob, jgl is noob he dont do drake too, fuck fuck, you are all noob, i carry and you noob, etc etc.**

Kuroki Kaze: + flaming
Kuroki Kaze: the more interestin
Kuroki Kaze: is miss fortune
Kuroki Kaze: 1million500 point on miss fortune
Kuroki Kaze: she play like first time
Kuroki Kaze: mf its realy your acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf?

**Keep asking the behavior of adc. Trolling suicide. Main miss fortune on 2/15 keep write on chat we lose because of shit support, fuck noob support report.**

Kuroki Kaze: you keep using the same word
Kuroki Kaze: lol

**Again and again insult from adc.**

Kuroki Kaze: kaisa vlad trynd
Kuroki Kaze: bot

**Info again. 3 enemy jungle hiding, i avoid 2 player of my team to get killed by them.**

Kuroki Kaze: intelligent call
Kuroki Kaze: zed

After game 

Kuroki Kaze: last game 2/11
Kuroki Kaze: that was support too?
Kuroki Kaze: your just a troll acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf..

**After game chat, adc => report this shit support, noob support fuck you, loser, we lose because of support.**

~~Moderation of forum :~~

_You had bad behavior, you flame, you deserve the ban, focus on yourself

My understanding : never use more than 5 sentence on a chat with a risk of report, you will get banned._{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

replies.body:
Locking this thread since the OP has already received answers regarding their chat logs yet still insists on arguing with others despite that. In the future remember that it's not using chat itself that's the problem, it's using it to verbally abuse and harass others that's the problem, and that other peoples poor behavior does not excuse your own.

Feel free to contact us at the [Moderation Discord](https://discordapp.com/channels/230113905668653056/306220435262144512) or at [Discuss the Boards]( https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/community-moderation) for any questions, comments or concerns about this. Thank you and have a good day.

i don't understand tis obsession with matery points as if it means something

the {{champion:74}} with the most mastery points in the world is currently in mid bronze at level 400+ and ~9 million mastery points(on heimer alone)

**mastery points aren't an indicator of skill. they're an indicator of availability to play the game**

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2019-04-01T12:41:28.244+0000)
>
> i don't understand tis obsession with matery points as if it means something
> 
> the {{champion:74}} with the most mastery points in the world is currently in mid bronze at level 400+ and ~9 million mastery points(on heimer alone)
> 
> **mastery points aren't an indicator of skill. they're an indicator of availability to play the game**

Where did you saw i speak about skill or rank ?

I speak about the **behavior**.

That mean he has been playing for a very long time.

But he was insulting and flaming a whole game with cancerous attitude, something is wrong there.

>Where did you saw i speak about skill or rank ?

>Kuroki Kaze: i dont understand why a 1million missfortune player
Kuroki Kaze: play like this

>Kuroki Kaze: the more interestin
Kuroki Kaze: is miss fortune
Kuroki Kaze: 1million500 point on miss fortune
Kuroki Kaze: she play like first time
Kuroki Kaze: mf its realy your acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf?

>Kuroki Kaze: last game 2/11
Kuroki Kaze: that was support too?
Kuroki Kaze: your just a troll acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf..

there^

>But he was insulting and flaming a whole game with cancerous attitude, something is wrong there.

someone else being toxic first does not make it ok for you to be toxic too. 

it doesn't matter if he started it 

it doesn't matter if, in your opinion, what you said is not as bad as what he said. 

toxic is toxic and harassing another player for most of that chat is pretty damn toxic

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T12:55:34.108+0000)
>
> Kuroki Kaze: play like this
> Kuroki Kaze: is miss fortune
> Kuroki Kaze: 1million500 point on miss fortune
> Kuroki Kaze: she play like first time
> Kuroki Kaze: mf its realy your acc
> Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf?
> Kuroki Kaze: that was support too?
> Kuroki Kaze: your just a troll acc
> Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf..
> 
> there^
> 
> someone else being toxic first does not make it ok for you to be toxic too. 
> 
> it doesn't matter if he started it 
> 
> it doesn't matter if, in your opinion, what you said is not as bad as what he said. 
> 
> toxic is toxic and harassing another player for most of that chat is pretty damn toxic

**You keep using the same argument as other.**

**Asking a toxic why he is toxic = you are toxic too ?**

**You tell me that asking why a player with more 1M5 points acts strangely, flame and insult is synonymous with being toxic?**

it is incredible the means by which you seek to justify the unjustifiable, it is only on this forum that I read this kind of thing, it would have to start to ask questions right?

>You tell me that asking why a player with more 1M5 points acts strangely, flame and insult is synonymous with being toxic?

asking once is ok

repeating the question a bunch of times for the purposes of being a passive agressive jerk is toxic tho

i'm sorry you disagree but that's how reality works

again

someone else being bad at the game does not make it ok for you to harass them about it. bad games exist. everyone has them. even you.

how would you feel if someone did that to you in a bad game where nothing goes according to plan?

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kaze,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T13:36:26.816+0000)
>
> But you don't understand that i am the one being harassed, insulted of fucking noob and flamed an whole game ?
> 
> It's a joke or you are trolling?

**But you don't understand that i am the one being harassed, insulted of "fucking noob support" and flamed an whole game because the adc keep write that we lose because i am a bad support?**

**It's a joke or you are trolling me?**
i understand that he harassed you first but that doesn't mean it's ok for you to counter harass in retaliation

> [{quoted}](name=Voldymort,realm=EUNE,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=0000000000000000000000000000000000010000,timestamp=2019-04-01T13:57:38.925+0000)
>
> i understand that he harassed you first but that doesn't mean it's ok for you to counter harass in retaliation

You keep write that asking why i got harassed by an experienced player is a counter harass? 

How can you say things so blindly

Don't even say that i spam chat, when i wrote upper i asked it 2 times on a game of 45 min.

this is the least time i'm repeating myself:

>Kuroki Kaze: i dont understand why a 1million missfortune player
Kuroki Kaze: play like this

>Kuroki Kaze: the more interestin
Kuroki Kaze: is miss fortune
Kuroki Kaze: 1million500 point on miss fortune

>Kuroki Kaze: last game 2/11
Kuroki Kaze: that was support too?
Kuroki Kaze: your just a troll acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf..

this is harrassment, 

it doesnt matter if he started it or how much worse he was than you

you can continue to be in denial as long as you want but that's how things work.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kaze,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=00000000000000000000000000000000000100000000000000000001,timestamp=2019-04-01T15:31:50.508+0000)
>
> I was punished by using the chat and being reported aswell.
> That not the rules, because there are any trace of harrassement, toxicity, or bad flame.
> The rules you call, is the system that you are sleeping on.
> 
> I ask aswell, bring up there the mass of honor i got over my 222 games ? the number of report i got?
> 
> You spit on the mass of honor I got, because of a game and a troller that deserves a permanent ban, in view of his account and his behavior, he surely keep insult/flame every game, combined with int/feed easily locatable by the 3 last demo, because he got many death, and it's recess because of a shit support.
> 
> I am someone of fair and honest, the result is before your eyes, you just ignore it.

Again, you don't have to agree, but the rules state Riot defines what is harassment. You may not think it is, but Riot has defined what you did as harassment.
You don't have to agree, but those are the rules. You asked why you were punished. He is telling you.

Context doesn't matter. 
How many times you say X during Y time doesn't matter. 

You flamed another player for playing bad, and had no right to do so.

I noticed that the logs only show "Match 2".

This implies that you're choosing to not post all of your chat logs.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=0004,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:06:33.101+0000)
>
> I noticed that the logs only show "Match 2".
> 
> This implies that you're choosing to not post all of your chat logs.

This is a new thread to speak only about this chat log 2.

I got only two chat logs, where i put a screen to proof it on my first thread.

If you got multiple games in your chat logs you can't just ignore one and claim that you don't deserve a restriction based on that.

Both games went into deciding if a punishment was to be issued, otherwise they wouldn't have been given to you. Not just game 1, and not just game 2. At **least** game 1 *and* game 2.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=000400000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:12:51.938+0000)
>

> 
> Both games went into deciding if a punishment was to be issued, otherwise they wouldn't have been given to you. Not just game 1, and not just game 2. At **least** game 1 *and* game 2.

With the auto system, if the game 2 wasn't count, i shouldn't got chat restriction.

I assume for the first chat, i called a rammus "useless".

They keep saying i did harassment on game 2.

They don't even know the definition of it, there is no trace of harassment, they are the only hot head there, this forum is hell.

 **LAW illegal behaviour towards a person that causes mental or emotional suffering, which includes repeated unwanted contacts without a reasonable purpose, insults, threats, touching, or offensive language**

All of this definition, is what i suffered during 40min.

Insulting people, such as pointing out their mastery score for the purpose of belittlement or calling them a troll, can inch your account closer to a punishment.

You're not allowed to insult other people in the game. Period.

> [{quoted}](name=AeroWaffle,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=00040000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:28:40.311+0000)
>
> Insulting people, such as pointing out their mastery score for the purpose of belittlement or calling them a troll, can inch your account closer to a punishment.
> 
> You're not allowed to insult other people in the game. Period.

Calling someone after game when i realise that she just int/feed on purpose and blame the support is an **insult** ?

Askin why an experienced player with high mastery is acting so bad is an **insult** ?

You are something.
Yes. Yes it is. Now move on.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kaze,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=0004000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:22:32.608+0000)

That's exactly how your chat log reads. Harassment of the MF
You spent most of the match arguing with and harassing the MF, including looking up their match history to flame them more after the game was over.

>

The match lasted 40min.

The time spent asking mf behavior, it under 1 minutes of typing.

I looked up the match history tommorrow.
You can saw it on the screen upper, she played one game after mine, then one tommorrow. 

That confirm she got the same feeding/suicide attitude, and she was potentialy got the same toxic attitude toward her support.

"including looking up their match history to flame them more after the game was over."

Also, what the flame you talk about? the chat after game is posted.

After game

Kuroki Kaze: last game 2/11
Kuroki Kaze: that was support too?
Kuroki Kaze: your just a troll acc
Kuroki Kaze: with 1M5 on mf..

She keep insist that we loss entirely because i am a shit noob support.

I replied what you can read upper. I suppose every lose and every bad stats, that was because of a shit support.

The way she play only 1 player, with bad stats and keep flaming at other, i call this a troll account.

Okay, most of your chat was spent on arguing and harassing.

Yes, that "after game" where you bring up a different match ("2/11") just to continue the argument is harassment, like I said.

I don't care what another player kept insisting. Riot doesn't ban you for what other players do. They ban you for what you do. You used the chat to flame the MF rather than focus on the game, and that's considered poor behavior that can result in a punishment if you're reported, which is exactly what happened.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=000300000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T15:40:50.510+0000)
>

> 
> I don't care what another player kept insisting. Riot doesn't ban you for what other players do. They ban you for what you do. You used the chat to flame the MF rather than focus on the game, and that's considered poor behavior that can result in a punishment if you're reported, which is exactly what happened.

40min of games, 1min arguing why she insult me => it's calling flame for you.

Excellent, lol, i'm the one being insulted/flamed during 40min. You keep write that i'm the one flamed mf because i try to understand it.

She wrote after match that we loss because of shit support.
I ask her if the last match loss with 2/11 was also because of shit support.

That's not called harrassement.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kaze,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=0003000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T15:49:47.558+0000)

>

Once again, I couldn't care less about what other people did in regards to your punishment, because you are punished for what _you_ did, not what they did. You harassed someone for playing poorly on a champ they have a high mastery score on, and continued this harassment into post-game, calling them a troll and even looking up their old matches to throw in their face. Deny it all you want, but it is harassment and you got punished for it.

> [{quoted}](name=KFCeytron,realm=NA,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=00030000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T16:42:00.750+0000)

Deny it all you want, but it is harassment and you got punished for it.

You keep ignoring the fact that i never speak about the gameplay of mf.

I am the one being insulted/flamed because i am a shit support.

And i tried to understand the attitude, over 1M5 masteries why i got insult every second, and why the player inf/feed on purpose?

For the end.
The adc keep insulting me after game because i am shit '' we lost because of you "
Then, i call her a troll after seeing that she got similar result on her history and she was surely doing it on purpose to troll.

> [{quoted}](name=Kuroki Kaze,realm=EUW,application-id=ZGEFLEUQ,discussion-id=LBWKY8Tg,comment-id=000300000000000000000000,timestamp=2019-04-01T17:00:25.371+0000)

> Kuroki Kaze: last game 2/11

And the rest of your post is about other people's behavior, which has nothing to do with your punishment, so I'm not sure why you keep bringing it up like it matters:

fucking noob support

Your behavior explain what you are, dishonest.

Okay, look. You've got two options here.

The first option is to keep going in the same direction that you're going and ignoring everything that the mods and more experienced players are telling you. Who knows? You MIGHT find the one yahoo after the countless people who have already commented who agrees with you. Then what? Congratulations? You win? What MF did was wrong. How you responded to MF was also wrong. You can choose to accept this or not, but that's what I see all of the responses in this thread telling you. Who the fuck cares if some randos on the internet blame you for something in a video game? If what they say bugs you so much then you mute them, report them after the game, and wash your hands of it.

It doesn't matter if this is the course of action that you personally think is warranted. I'm not going to argue about morals or ethics on this as it's pretty obvious from your responses that it's pretty pointless to do. The bottom line is this and ONLY this. Riot has deemed the chat log unacceptable. A majority of the community has deemed the chat log unacceptable. You either adapt to the rules that are placed before you and keep playing, or you stop wasting your time here and find a different game to play since the rules aren't about to change just because they don't suit you.
